properties.address: 26 West High Street, Forfar, Angus DD8 1BA
properties.description: The Anchorage is a safe space where everyone can come and be made welcome. It is a safe place to stop a while and rest, restore, renew, restock and reconnect. All Souls Church have created this Anchorage in response to the need in our town for a free place for people of all faiths or none to just come and 'be'. A space to gather together, and rebuild a sense of community post covid.
properties.title: The Anchorage

properties.address: East and Old Parish church, 38-40 E High St, Forfar DD8 2EG. Monday to Friday, 9:30am to 12noon until the end of March.
properties.description: East and Old Church have a heat hub where anyone from the community can come along and feel warm, relaxed and so much more. Daily newspapers will be available to read, games, puzzles, music, TV, hot drinks and some food also, charge your phones and have a chat. Cost - FREE!!!
properties.title: Community spaces

properties.address: Strathmore Cricket Club, Lochside Park, Graham Crescent, Forfar DD8 1DU, Fridays 10am to 12:30pm (11am till 12:30pm for food).
properties.description: Fancy a cuppa and a chat with others? Freshly cooked refreshments including scones, soup, paninis. Come along and find out what's in your community.
properties.title: Cricket Café

properties.address: East & Old Parish Church, 38-40 East High Street, Forfar, DD8 2EG, Tuesdays from 12:15pm to 2pm.
properties.description: The Well Bean Café offers a safe alcohol and drug free venue to meet and socialise. Self help and local service information and resources are available within the café. Workshops and activities will also be run with the aim of improving wellbeing.

hours._text: Volunteering opportunities are available for people in recovery who are keen to provide peer support to others and learn new skills. The Well Bean offers affordable drinks and snacks and is a family friendly venue. All income generated will go back into the café and activities that support wellbeing.

properties.title: Well Bean Community Café

properties.address: Meigle Church Hall, Ardler Rd, Meigle PH12 8RT
properties.description: Weekly group with speakers followed by chat and refreshments - all ages welcome
properties.title: Meigle & Ardler Community Education Group

properties.address: Kinloch Memorial Hall, Dundee Road, Meigle, Blairgowrie, PH12 8SD
properties.description: Parent run playgroup - children ages 0-4 and parents/carers
properties.title: Meigle Minis Playgroup
